name: MD - Clinical Assistance Recommender System
description: A subpart of a larger assistive system to help medical practitioners identify possible lab orders and prescription details based on selected Diagnosis ICD codes and patient vitals.
role: Worked as the research lead to analyze Lab Orders and Prescriptions data, transforming it into a more usable form and identifying trends using pandas and matplotlib
Developed two separate recommendation pipelines for Lab Orders and Prescriptions using conditional probabilities and Diagnosis Clustering
Integrated the Prescriptions Recommendation pipeline with the Medication Sig Recommendation System
Devised an implicit evaluation strategy to validate the usability of the recommenders based on click data
Fine-tuned the system with several improvements and enhancements
